DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal PROBIT study investigate influence randomize breastfeed promotion intervention design increase duration exclusivity breastfeeding ( `` breastfeed promotion intervention '' ) development maternal child health outcome . The hypothesis randomization intervention associate low child adiposity , low risk asthma atopy , improve lung function , improve cognitive outcome .
